data.client_settings: Desktop Canary, 0.0.163. Desktop PTB 0.0.33. Desktop Stable 0.0.297
data.actual_result: If you keep pressing the arrow key it will stop at some given points, forcing you to have to re-click the list from time to time to be able to scroll down
data.expected_result: You should be able to scroll down to the bottom of the list without it stopping
data.short_description: Emojis list stops when scrolling down with arrow keys after aclicking an empty space
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord on any desktop version and open the emojis list - Click an empty white space on the right. (Link for help: <https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/277638566669058048/342526983369916417/Untitled-1.png>) - Scroll down with your arrow keys
